sentence_zh_TW: 她今天有一個重要的面試，為了這個機會，她準備了很久。
sentence: She has an important ______ today, and she has prepared for this opportunity for a long time.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了保持健康，定期做運動如跑步和游泳是非常有幫助的。
sentence: To stay healthy, it is very helpful to regularly do ______ like running and swimming.

sentence_zh_TW: 她從小就夢想成為一名歌手，現在她終於實現了這個夢想。
sentence: She dreamed of becoming a ______ since she was young, and now she has finally achieved that dream.

sentence_zh_TW: 今天下午的會議將討論公司的新策略和未來計畫。
sentence: The ______ this afternoon will discuss the new strategies and future plans for the company.

sentence_zh_TW: 這本書包含了很多有幫助的信息，幫助讀者更好地理解主題。
sentence: This book contains a lot of ______ information that helps readers understand the topic better.

sentence_zh_TW: 她告訴我一個令人興奮的消息，我都忍不住想要分享出去。
sentence: She decided to ______ me an exciting piece of news that I couldn't wait to share.

sentence_zh_TW: 在學校，學生們的目標是通過所有測試，以獲得好成績。
sentence: In school, students aim to ______ all their tests to achieve good grades.

sentence_zh_TW: 他在生日那天收到了許多禮物，特別是在他滿十三歲的時候。
sentence: He received many gifts on his birthday, especially when he turned ______ years old.

sentence_zh_TW: 在商店裡，這個玩具的價格是兩美元五十個分，非常合理。
sentence: In the store, the toy costs two dollars and fifty ______, which is very reasonable.

sentence_zh_TW: 當我感到無聊的時候，我會尋找一些東西來娛樂自己，比如閱讀或畫畫。
sentence: When I feel bored, I look for ______ to entertain myself, such as reading or drawing.

sentence_zh_TW: 回到家後，他感到非常放鬆，因為這裡的氛圍非常舒適和安靜。
sentence: After returning ______, he felt very relaxed because the atmosphere here is very comfortable and quiet.

sentence_zh_TW: 經過一整天的工作後，他感到疲倦，想要好好休息一下。
sentence: After a long day of work, he feels ______ and wants to take a good rest.

sentence_zh_TW: 冬天的寒冷讓她喜歡待在家裡，喝熱巧克力，閱讀書籍。
sentence: The cold of ______ makes her prefer to stay at home, sipping hot chocolate and reading books.

sentence_zh_TW: 在他的生日派對上，他收到了來自朋友們的＂Happy ______ Birthday＂的祝福。
sentence: At his birthday party, he received many wishes of 'Happy ______ Birthday' from his friends.

sentence_zh_TW: 學習基數非常重要，因為它們是數學中基本的數字系統之一。
sentence: Learning ______ numbers is very important as they are fundamental to the number system in mathematics.

sentence_zh_TW: 他打算在三十歲的時候開始一個新的事業，這是他一直夢想的目標。
sentence: He plans to start a new career at the age of ______, which has always been his dream goal.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們的課程會在學期的第十二週進行一次測試，以評估學生的進步。
sentence: Our course will have a test in the ______ week of the semester to assess students' progress.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個陰雲密布的日子裡，整個天空都變成了灰色，讓人感到有些沉悶。
sentence: On this overcast day, the entire sky has turned ______, making everything feel a bit gloomy.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這部電影中，女主角被描繪成像女神一樣美麗的角色。
sentence: In this movie, the main character is portrayed as a beautiful ______ like a goddess.

sentence_zh_TW: 當他獨自走在黑暗的街道上時，他感到有些害怕，心跳加速。
sentence: When he walked alone on the dark street, he felt a little ______, and his heart started to race.
